title: The Most Explosive Revelation Yet In The Biden Scandal (Ep 1414)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the explosive ties between the latest Hunter Biden email drop, and players tied to the troubling Uranium One scandal. 

News Picks:

Explosive new Hunter Biden emails emerge.


John Solomon’s 2018 article about Uranium One.

The Reuters article about CEFC discussed in the show.

Did Dominion use the compromised software system?

Huge data leak exposes Chinese communist party members embedded in western companies and governments.  

Is this disastrous housing policy about to return to the suburbs?

Pentagon investigating what caused a false alarm about missile attack on US base.


Cleveland Indians to drop team name.
